headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: AIG, Vistra, Microchip, Under Armour
summary: ↗️ Vistra (VST): The power-generation company plans to buy Cogentrix Energy in a roughly $4 billion deal that will include natural-gas generation facilities. Shares rallied as much as 5% Tuesday morning.

headline: AIG CEO to step down in June, Ford posts strong Q4 sales
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman and Yahoo Finance markets and data editor Jared Blikre track several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including American International Group (AIG) CEO Peter Zaffino announcing his plans to step down this June, Microchip Technology's (MCHP) preliminary earnings results pointing to a recovery in sales, and Ford (F) reporting strong fourth quarter sales figures. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Microchip, Under Armour rise in premarket; Adidas falls
summary: Investing.com-- S&P 500 Index futures were little changed at 7:23 AM in New York, as the early New Year rally showed signs of pausing with investors waiting for fresh data to assess the strength of the U.S. economy. Here are the biggest pre-market movers: Nvidia led the so-called Magnificent Seven after Chief Executive Jensen Huang said the company’s highly anticipated Rubin data center processors are now in production and that customers will soon be able to test the technology. headline: Microchip shares rise after preannouncement as recovery gains momentum
summary: Investing.com -- Microchip Technology shares have risen more than 4% premarket on Tuesday after the company said late Monday that quarterly revenue would come in well above prior guidance, signalling strengthening demand and progress on its recovery plan.

headline: Microchip Technology (MCHP): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: Since July 2025, Microchip Technology has been in a holding pattern, posting a small loss of 2.9% while floating around $69.41. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 10.1% gain during that period.
